body:
A copy of your court application will be sent to the other person. This will include your contact details.

If you think the other person poses a threat to the safety of you or your children you can keep your contact details private.
heading: Keeping your contact details private
xlede: Make an application under section 8 of the Children Act 1989 for a child arrangements, prohibited steps, specific issue order or to vary or discharge or ask permission to make a section 8 order
